ygData.subject: Re: 8th lvl spells
ygData.msgSnippet: Most of those spells you have not buyed are only to train your skills. So when you get higher lvl and get a USEFULL spell that use that skill you have high
ygData.messageBody:
Most of those spells you have not buyed are only to train your skills. So
when you get higher lvl and get a USEFULL spell that use that skill you have
high skill in it. )


-----Original Message-----
From: Stefan Raets <SRAETS@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Sunday, April 25, 1999 3:14 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: 8th lvl spells


>From: "Stefan Raets" <SRAETS@...>
>
>> I'm about to become 8th level can you give me the spells
>> that are best to buy
>> first someone please send me a list in order from first to
>> buy then to last
>
>Shock Of Ice
>Lesser Shielding
>Shadow Step
>Fire Bolt
>
>The other 4 I haven't even bought myself yet. Eye of Zomm looks
>totally useless, ditto for Sense Summoned, and the other two are
>combat spells I've never seen anybody use.
>
>Aznyin
